message.body: Heya, how thangs? Any problems with the space?
Hey there! No problems.. I only used the space once.. Found there to be not as much ceiling height as I would like but I'd like to get in there and see how much height I would have w a beam clamp
Yeah, a clamp would get ya another 6 - 8 inches...dunno if that's enough to make a difference
Hmm..I'd like to try it out. Need to get/borrow a beam clamp first.
Lol! I keep u in the hoop loop ya heard! :P
Ok, cool. Keep me ...in the loop (get it?!)
